name: Pair Master
description:
Start playing Pair Match now to enjoy a journey through a variety of colorful levels. Match 3D items, beat the levels, get dozens of stars and other rewards to unlock and enjoy more fun content.
The game includes:
- Neat-looking items to find and match.
- Challenging and fun levels to play through.
- Clubs and tournaments to show everyone who’s the true Pair Master!
Stylish design and pacifying music for you to relax and enjoy.
The game is so simple but so enthralling!
Literally everyone can join in and have a great time playing. All you have to do is to find pairs, win levels, get special rewards from bonus chests. You can also play with friends, so don’t forget to bring them to the game - the victory and the team chest reward are sweeter when shared.
Get the game now so you won’t miss all the fun! You have so many items to find and features to enjoy. And more of them are coming in the regular updates of new levels, 3D objects and non-stop puzzle matching fun!
